nodes.text: Kor Nasirii was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It was the throneworld of the Nasirii kajidic. A hyperlane connected Kor Nasirii to the planet of Kor Vosadii. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire in 3643 BBY, Kor Nasirii housed databases belonging to members of the Hutt species. The information contained within the databases was used to blackmail prominent figures throughout the galaxy.

Kor Nasirii was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas—a reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, and published on August 18, 2009. The planet was later mentioned again in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by BioWare and released in 2011, in which it was used as a possible location for players to assign their companions on individual quests.
